title: Sonic seasoning
description: Does sound make food taste better?

vocabItems.word: you eat with your eyes first
vocabItems.definition: (idiom) food appears more appetizing when it looks good on the plate
words that sound like what they mean eg., bang, boom, moo, thud, whack, zoom
low pleasant sound a liquid makes when it flows quickly through a narrow space
